docna.cdata!:
Ethiopia - Finchaa Hydroelectric Project :
            Loan 0596 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Ethiopia - Finchaa Hydroelectric
            Project : Loan 0596 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

docna.cdata!:
Ethiopia - Finchaa Hydroelectric Project :
            Loan 0596 - Guarantee Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Ethiopia - Finchaa Hydroelectric
            Project : Loan 0596 - Guarantee Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project would consist of
            the construction of a low earth-filled dam on the Finchaa
            River, a tributary of the Blue Nile, approximately 170 Km
            northwest of Addis Ababa and a power station equipped with
            three 33.3 MW generators. An associated 220 KV transmission
            line would be constructed, together with a 105 MVA terminal
            substation near Addis Ababa.
